definition: young and inexperienced, young bird that has just fledged or become capable of flying
details:
adjective
- young and inexperienced
= example: young and inexperienced
= synonyms: unfledged, callow
- (of a young bird) having acquired its flight feathers
= synonyms: fledgeling
noun
- young bird that has just fledged or become capable of flying
= synonyms: fledgeling
- any new participant in some activity
= synonyms: starter
